predicate.note: Frames file for 'founder' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Bungling.

example.name: cause as argument
example.text: Free State Glass Industries of Warrenton, Va., a small fabricator of architectural glass, was foundering under its original management.
example.arg: Free State Glass Industries of Warrenton, Va., a small fabricator of architectural glass,

example.name: cause as adjunct
example.text: The sporty coupe foundered in part because American buyers didn't go for the car's unusual double-wing rear spoiler.
example.arg: in part because American buyers didn't go for the car's unusual double-wing rear spoiler
